quotes: In March 2021, she became the first woman and the first African to serve as Director-General of the World Trade Organization.
Earlier in her career, Okonjo-Iweala had two terms as Nigeria's Finance Minister, from 2003-2006 and 2011-2015;

Earlier in her career, Okonjo-Iweala had two terms as Nigeria's Finance Minister, from 2003-2006 and 2011-2015; she also briefly acted as Foreign Minister in 2006.
